description:
Did you know that common household items like cleaners, cookware and soap can pose a serious threat to our health and waistlines?

Chemicals in common products which we use every day and in our environments are linked to rising rates of diseases including obesity, diabetes, thyroid diseases, behavioral problems, cancers and more.

Are you eating healthy, whole foods, counting calories, exercising extensively and still cannot get rid of that stubborn weight?

Do you follow all of your doctor’s instructions but still cannot get your blood sugar under control?

Are you curious about how you can take proactive steps to prevent obesity and diabetes in your future?

This course is for you! You will learn about the ways in which a variety of factors impact our waistlines and overall health including the many chemicals which are pervasive in our environments.

In this course you will learn about the pervasive natural of toxic chemicals in our lives and how they impact our health. I will focus especially on the role that chemicals play in obesity and blood sugar balance. This is a huge topic and there is so much important information to learn about this area. The Simple | Pure | WholeTM Wellness Method for cleansing your environment can help reduce your exposure and enhance your health!

Through video lectures and handouts you will explore the link between chemicals, obesity and your health.

I also offer some simple yet powerful steps from my Simple | Pure | WholeTM Wellness Method for cleansing your environment and obtaining optimal health! You will be empowered with a set of simple yet powerful tools which you can implement in your life to reduce your exposure to toxic chemicals, optimize your weight and maintain great health!
title: Does this toxicant make me look fat?
